title: Presidential Determination on Refugee Admissions for Fiscal Year 2026
summary: Presidential Determination No. 2025-13, issued on September 30, 2025, establishes that up to 7,500 refugees may be admitted to the United States during Fiscal Year 2026, based on humanitarian concerns or national interest. The admissions will primarily focus on Afrikaners from South Africa and other victims of discrimination. This determination is subject to existing Presidential policies, including stringent identification verification, joint national interest determinations by the Secretaries of State and Homeland Security, and restrictions on entries detrimental to national interest.
